LayoutNode.Content: organization chart of the movement Movement ecosystem and actors
LayoutNode.SRC: organization chart of the movementMovement ecosystem and actors

LayoutNode.Content: The Wikimedia movement is the totality of people, activities, and values which revolve around Wikimedia sites and projects:
LayoutNode.SRC: The Wikimedia movement is the totality of people, activities, and values which revolve around Wikimedia sites and projects:

LayoutNode.Content: a collection of values shared by individuals (freedom of speech, knowledge for everyone, community sharing etc.); a collection of activities (conferences, workshops, wikiacademies etc.); a collection of organizations ( Wikimedia Foundation , Wikimedia chapters etc.), as well as some free electrons (individuals without chapters) and similar-minded organizations.
LayoutNode.SRC:
• a collection of values shared by individuals (freedom of speech, knowledge for everyone, community sharing etc.);
  • a collection of activities (conferences, workshops, wikiacademies etc.);
    • a collection of organizations (Wikimedia Foundation, Wikimedia chapters etc.), as well as some free electrons (individuals without chapters) and similar-minded organizations.

LayoutNode.Content: Contents
1 Shared values 2 Shared projects 3 Wikimedia organizations 4 The Wikimedia Foundation 5 Wikimedia stakeholders 6 See also
LayoutNode.SRC: 1Shared values2Shared projects3Wikimedia organizations4The Wikimedia Foundation5Wikimedia stakeholders6See also

LayoutNode.Content: Shared values [ edit ]
LayoutNode.SRC: Shared values[edit]

LayoutNode.Content: a collection of values shared by individuals (freedom of speech, knowledge for everyone, community sharing etc.);
LayoutNode.SRC: • a collection of values shared by individuals (freedom of speech, knowledge for everyone, community sharing etc.);

LayoutNode.Content: Shared projects [ edit ]
LayoutNode.SRC: Shared projects[edit]

LayoutNode.Content: a collection of activities around Wikimedia projects : Wikipedia, in more than 277 language versions, other content related wikis, such as Wikisource, Wikibooks or Wikidata, 'backstage' wikis or organisational wikis, such as this Meta-Wiki, conferences, workshops, wikiacademies etc. (offline activities);
LayoutNode.SRC:
a collection of activities around Wikimedia projects:
  • Wikipedia, in more than 277 language versions,
  • other content related wikis, such as Wikisource, Wikibooks or Wikidata,
  • 'backstage' wikis or organisational wikis, such as this Meta-Wiki,
  • conferences, workshops, wikiacademies etc. (offline activities);

LayoutNode.Content: Wikimedia organizations [ edit ]
LayoutNode.SRC: Wikimedia organizations[edit]

LayoutNode.Content: a collection of organizations, as well as some free electrons (individuals acting outside any group) and similar-minded organizations: Wikimedia Foundation and Wikimedia Chapters , Wikimedia Thematic Organisations , Wikimedia User Groups .
LayoutNode.SRC: a collection of organizations, as well as some free electrons (individuals acting outside any group) and similar-minded organizations:Wikimedia Foundation and Wikimedia Chapters,Wikimedia Thematic Organisations,Wikimedia User Groups.

LayoutNode.Content: The Wikimedia Foundation [ edit ]
LayoutNode.SRC: The Wikimedia Foundation[edit]

LayoutNode.Content: The owner of the trademark Wikimedia is the Wikimedia Foundation (WMF). Linked to the WMF are the Wikimedia Foundation's own organs and committees:
LayoutNode.SRC: The owner of the trademark Wikimedia is the Wikimedia Foundation (WMF). Linked to the WMF are the Wikimedia Foundation's own organs and committees:

LayoutNode.Content: board staff advisory board Independent Committees installed by the WMF board Affiliations committee Language committee Funds Dissemination Committee
LayoutNode.SRC:
• board
  • staff
  • advisory board
    • Independent Committees installed by the WMF boardAffiliations committeeLanguage committeeFunds Dissemination Committee

LayoutNode.Content: Wikimedia stakeholders [ edit ]
LayoutNode.SRC: Wikimedia stakeholders[edit]

LayoutNode.Content: More generally speaking, Wikimedia stakeholders may also be part of the Wikimedia movement, i.e. readers of Wikimedia content, donors, schools, GLAM , similar-minded institutions, and companies co-operating with the Wikimedia Foundation or other Wikimedia organizations.
LayoutNode.SRC: More generally speaking, Wikimedia stakeholders may also be part of the Wikimedia movement, i.e. readers of Wikimedia content, donors, schools, GLAM, similar-minded institutions, andcompanies co-operating with the Wikimedia Foundation or other Wikimedia organizations.

LayoutNode.Content: See also [ edit ]
LayoutNode.SRC: See also[edit]

LayoutNode.Content: The post and the thread on foundation-l mailing list, started by Anthere , where the term and concept was launched. Communication issues musings of a dinosaur (about 17:30), Anthere's speech at Wikimania 2008 . Scaling up: can Wikimedia Become A 300 Million People Movement By 2020? (about minute 4), Eloquence's speech at Wikimania 2009 . Use of the term in Wikimedia mailing lists . Complementary projects Retrieved from " https://meta.wikimedia.org/w/index.php?title=Wikimedia_movement&oldid=18458038 " Category : Wikimedia
